sourcesContent:
export const lightTheme = {
  body: '#fff',
  text: '#363537',
  textHover: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)',
  toggleBorder: '#ced4da',
  navBackground: '#f0f0f0',
  inputBackground: '#fff',
}

export const darkTheme = {
  body: '#363537',
  text: '#FAFAFA',
  textHover: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)',
  toggleBorder: '#29282A',
  navBackground: '#29282A',
  inputBackground: '#403f41',
}
